column2: Bezeichnung

DPM8605 0-60v 0-5A 300W TTL/CMOS
Switching PSU, 10A 120W 12v
Amplifier DIY enclosure (this is a luxus box; Just needs to be an all metal box)
Lapp ÖLFLEX CLASSIC 110 CY 4x0,75mm² shielded wire
Lapp ÖLFLEX CLASSIC 110 CY 2x0,5mm² shielded wire
DC connector female socket 5,5x2,5mm
IEC socket
IEC (power) connector wire
ESP32 NodeMCU WROOM32 38 Pin Azdelivery
Silentstepstick TMC2209
PLA+ Filament 300g (300g is just a very rough number)
TPU Filament 200g (200g is just a very rough number)
Hailege 2.4" ILI9341 240x320 SPI TFT LCD Display Touch
On/Off switch
Different JST wires.. 2pole, 13pole, 3 pole 4 pole
40mm fan (I use 24v running it at 12v for silence)
120mm fan artic P12 silent 3pole
Note: Cheap fans can introduce more noise in the system.
Also high speed fans are also not recommended.
The prices are ebay/amazon prices and it should be no problem to get it down a little
